title: Young and Beautiful
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:15.50] I've seen the world, done it all, had my cake now
[00:24.03] Diamonds, brilliant, and Bel Air now
[00:31.96] Hot summer nights, mid-July
[00:36.36] When you and I were forever wild
[00:40.69] The crazy days, city lights
[00:44.72] The way you'd play with me like a child
[00:49.98] Will you still love me when I'm no longer young and beautiful?
[00:58.28] Will you still love me when I got nothing but my aching soul?
[01:05.26] I know you will, I know you will, I know that you will
[01:13.23] Will you still love me when I'm no longer beautiful?
[01:22.03] I've seen the world, lit it up as my stage now
[01:30.24] Channeling angels in the new age now
[01:38.07] Hot summer days, rock and roll
[01:42.75] The way you'd play for me at your show
[01:46.79] And all the ways I got to know
[01:50.68] Your pretty face and electric soul
[01:55.93] Will you still love me when I'm no longer young and beautiful?
[02:04.26] Will you still love me when I got nothing but my aching soul?
[02:11.50] I know you will, I know you will, I know that you will
[02:19.47] Will you still love me when I'm no longer beautiful?
[02:29.18] Dear Lord, when I get to Heaven
[02:32.71] Please let me bring my man
[02:37.47] When he comes, tell me that you'll let him in
[02:41.21] Father, tell me if you can
[02:45.15] All that grace, all that body
[02:48.84] All that face makes me wanna party
[02:53.35] He's my sun, he makes me shine like diamonds
[03:02.57] Will you still love me when I'm no longer young and beautiful?
[03:10.97] Will you still love me when I got nothing but my aching soul?
[03:17.94] I know you will, I know you will, I know that you will
[03:25.67] Will you still love me when I'm no longer beautiful?
[03:34.37] Will you still love me when I'm no longer beautiful?
[03:42.78] Will you still love me when I'm not young and beautiful?
[03:48.23]
